name: TextDrawSetPreviewVehCol
warnings: The textdraw MUST use the font type TEXT_DRAW_FONT_MODEL_PREVIEW in order for this function to have effect.
versions: This function was added in SA-MP 0.3x and will not work in earlier versions!
description: If a vehicle model is used in a 3D preview textdraw, this sets the two colour values for that vehicle.

params_body.name: text
params_body.description: The textdraw id that is set to display a 3D vehicle model preview.

params_body.name: color1
params_body.description: The primary Color ID to set the vehicle to.

params_body.name: color2
params_body.description: The secondary Color ID to set the vehicle to.

return_values: This function does not return any specific values.
